name: Stones&Hustle
0:
”Alexa, open Stones and Hustle and give me motivation”
”Alexa, open Stones and Hustle and tell me an inspirational quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stones and hustle
des: The Stones & Hustle app for Amazon Alexa provides random motivational phrases for entrepreneurs worldwide. By talking with the app, you'll get out of any slump you're in, and remember the only thing it takes to succeed is stones and hustle.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
